title: The Pirate Theme Music Gone?
body:
I no longer hear the new music, or the new announcer. It's all reverted back to the original.

Was this intended? If so, I am a sad summoner ;-;

replies.body:
Either two things:

They did it cause GP died

Or they added that toggle thing where you can choose which one you want.

It seems to be only in normal draft where im having this issue

All other queue's have the proper music/announcer
